data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهِ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
The word وَمَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:
The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From
The word دُونِ comes from the root د و ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: serve, worship, adore, venerate, accept the impression of a thing, obey with submissiveness or humility, approve, apply, devote, obedience, slave, keep to inseparably, subdue, assemble together, enslave.
data.sentence: The word تَعْبُدُونَ comes from the root ع ب د and is associated with the meanings: serve, worship, adore, venerate, accept the impression of a thing, obey with submissiveness or humility, approve, apply, devote, obedience, slave, keep to inseparably, subdue, assemble together, enslave.
The word أَنْتُمْ comes from the root ا ن ت م and is associated with the meanings: you (plural)

data.meanings: Hell or Hell-fire, name of the fire with which GOD will punish in the life to come, proper name of the abode of punishment.
data.sentence: The word جَهَنَّمَ comes from the root ج ه ن م and is associated with the meanings: Hell or Hell-fire, name of the fire with which GOD will punish in the life to come, proper name of the abode of punishment.

data.meanings: To throw pebbles at, scatter gravel, cast into the fire. Firewood, stones.
data.sentence: The word حَصَبُ comes from the root ح ص ب and is associated with the meanings: To throw pebbles at, scatter gravel, cast into the fire. Firewood, stones.

data.meanings: to be present, arrive at (any water to drink), go down into, draw near to (a place).
data.sentence: The word وَارِدُونَ comes from the root و ر د and is associated with the meanings: to be present, arrive at (any water to drink), go down into, draw near to (a place).
